publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2385 Tommy Sheridan: Tibetâ€”That the Parliament notes that the Chinese Vice-President is visiting Scotland this week and calls upon the First Minister to make representations to him on behalf of the people of Tibet who, as a nation, have been illegally occupied by the Chinese for the past 50 years.
S1M-2385 Tibet (lodged on 30 October 2001) Dr Elaine Murray*
S1M-2385 Tibet (lodged on 30 October 2001) Michael Russell*, Donald Gorrie*
